body_html: When using objects, the idea is that same-object=shared-weights and different-objects=non-shared-weights. But it should be very simple to not share, just create the object twice. Or am I missing something?
body_text: When using objects, the idea is that same-object=shared-weights and different-objects=non-shared-weights. But it should be very simple to not share, just create the object twice. Or am I missing something?
body: When using objects, the idea is that same-object=shared-weights and different-objects=non-shared-weights. But it should be very simple to not share, just create the object twice. Or am I missing something?
